meanings.definition: A person to whom something is addressed.
meanings.sent1: The addressee of the letter was eagerly waiting for its arrival.
meanings.sent2: Please make sure to write the correct address of the addressee on the envelope.
meanings.sent3: The addressee of the mysterious package turned out to be a friendly neighbor.
meanings.sent4: As the addressee of the message, she felt a sense of responsibility to respond promptly.
meanings.sent5: The addressee, with a puzzled expression, tried to decipher the handwriting on the envelope.

meanings.definition: The intended recipient of a letter or package.
meanings.sent1: The addressee of the parcel was thrilled to receive a surprise gift.
meanings.sent2: The postman delivered the package to the addressee without any delay.
meanings.sent3: The addressee of the letter was so excited that they tore open the envelope in anticipation.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the addressee of the world's most special delivery when she received the heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent5: The addressee's eyes lit up with joy upon seeing the familiar handwriting on the package.
